content: Hi babe, my brother's name is David.
Hi babe, my brother's name is David.
Hey baby! David, huh? That's a nice name. You two close?
Why are you speaking so fast? And by the way, what's my brother's name?
Why are you speaking so fast? And by the way, what's my brother's name?
Sorry, I'll slow down. Your brother's name is David. You literally just told me that, silly.
London? What about it, babe? You thinking about going there or something?
